resources.string: Looks like you already identified successfully before. Unfortunately you can\'t identify again.
Unfortunately the IBAN you entered is invalid or not supported.
The IBAN you provided cannot be used for identification. Please try again.
Unfortunately you have exceeded the maximum attempts of identification. Unfortunately we cannot identify you successfully.

You\'ll be asked to create an electronic signature by signing in to your existing bank account where an automatic reference transaction of 5 cents will be initiated to provide proof. Your 5 cents will automatically be sent back to your account afterwards.
